column4: My X refuses to do anything better than 1024x768x16 even though the screen is built for 1600x1200x24. I've dpkg-reconfigured it ... twice? 3 times? and ^altBksped itand everything; what can I do?
it's most lickely matter of screen refresh
it still has got refresh rate like 80hz or somethin
It's way higher than 80-odd hz, but I think it likes 60Hz for some reason
adjust in xorg.conf to be 60hz and try
does it need to be in the format ##-## or can I just put 60
is there a way to reset the xorg.conf?
or you can rm it and it'll re-defaultinate itself
How do I automatically reconfigure my X server?
let me know if you get it to work plz
